text: (Ba kofiron gufta mesavad): In azoʙ ʙa on saʙaʙ ast, ki cun Allohro ʙa jaktoi va ixlosi amal mexondand, sumo inkor mekarded va agar ʙaroi U sarike qaror medodand, sumo ʙa on sarik imon meovarded. Pas, farmon az oni Alloh ast. (U hokim ast dar xalqas, odil ast, ki zulm namekunad, hidojat mekunad, kasero, ki mexohad va gumroh mekunad kasero, ki mexohad va kasero, ki xohad rahm mekunad va kasero, ki ʙixohad azoʙ medihad.) Nest ma'ʙudi ʙarhaq ʙa cuz U, ʙalandmartaʙai ʙuzurg ast
